oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mayor Briley with ladies at Busby Ford, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1965
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mayor Briley is pictured at the Busby Ford automobile dealership, among several well-dressed ladies wearing hats and gloves and carrying baskets. They are on the car lot, located at 18th Avenue and Church Street. A tall man in a business suit is standing with them in front of a car. The 1965 City Directory cites George Busby, President. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 negative, filmstrip : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
Busby Ford (Nashville, Tenn.)
